title: Field-Centered Project Management Competency Development Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizing real-time collaborative activities applying situational learning theory in a smartphone-based limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more situational decision-making processes based on real project scenarios.
Learners can perform knowledge sharing with team members using online collaboration tools (e-debates) and draft at least one conflict resolution plan.
Learners can develop a risk response plan for a virtual case by applying a project risk management framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
